Dgame.Graphics.Transformable



abstract class Transformable: Dgame.Graphics.Moveable.Moveable;
Basic implementation for transformable objects.

Author:
rschuett

protected const void _applyTranslation();
Apply translation to the object.

abstract pure nothrow ref const(Vector2s) calculateCenter();
Calculate, store and return the center point.

void resetTranslation();
Reset the translation.

final void setCenter(ref const Vector2s center);
Set the rotation center.

final pure nothrow void setCenter(short x, short y);
Set the rotation center.

final const pure nothrow ref const(Vector2s) getCenter();
Returns the rotation center.

final pure nothrow void setRotation(short rotAngle);
Set a (new) rotation.

final pure nothrow void rotate(short rotAngle);
Increase/Decrease the rotation.

final const pure nothrow short getRotation();
Returns the current rotation.

final pure nothrow void setScale(float zoom);
Set a new scale.

final pure nothrow void scale(float zoom);
Increase/Decrease the scale/zoom.

final const pure nothrow float getScale();
Returns the current scale/zoom.
